LanguageData.Eclipse.label: eclipse
LanguageData.Eclipse.letterText: One of the moons of this planet has orbited in front of the sun. An eclipse has begun.
LanguageData.SolarFlare.label: solar flare
LanguageData.SolarFlare.letterText:
A solar flare has begun.

The intense radiation will shut down all electrical devices.

It should pass in about a day.
LanguageData.Aurora.label: aurora
LanguageData.Aurora.letterText: A beautiful aurora is lighting up the sky.\n\nThe undulating colors will boost the mood of anyone outside to see them, and make the night brighter.
